Node(IntVector2D, Node, double, double) - Constructor for class src.tiles.Node
initializing Node to represent a tile in our map, needed to implement our A* search Algorithm hCost-> is the heuristic path (straight line distance) gCost-> node to node cost fCost->combination of both note:lower cost doesn't necessarily mean shortest distance and our algorithm will take into consideration the cost if we give it enough details(further development).
